NSUserNotificationUsageDescription Clawdbrain needs notification permission to show alerts for agent actions. NSScreenCaptureDescription Clawdbrain captures the screen when the agent needs screenshots for context. NSCameraUsageDescription Clawdbrain can capture photos or short video clips when requested by the agent. NSLocationUsageDescription Clawdbrain can share your location when requested by the agent. NSMicrophoneUsageDescription Clawdbrain needs the mic for Voice Wake tests and agent audio capture. NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription Clawdbrain uses speech recognition to detect your Voice Wake trigger phrase.
